metadata.title: Configure npm Scripts for Development Workflow

prompt.goal: Configure npm Scripts for Development Workflow. To streamline the development process, this task involves adding essential scripts to the `package.json` file.

context.description: To streamline the development process, this task involves adding essential scripts to the `package.json` file. These scripts will handle common tasks such as starting the application, compiling the TypeScript code, and running the development server with auto-reloading.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: A `start` script is added to `package.json` that executes `node dist/index.js`.
A `build` script is added that executes `tsc`.
A `dev` script is added that executes `nodemon src/index.ts`.
